title: Desktop Widget OS
description: Enhance your project with desktop-like features. 'DesktopWidget' adds functionality like folders, taskbar, launcher, and right-click menus to your Unreal Engine projects.
longDescription:
Enhance your Unreal Engine projects with the powerful DesktopWidget plugin, designed to bring desktop-like functionality to your projects. With DesktopWidget, you can create interactive and dynamic widgets that mimic the familiar features of a desktop environment.

 

DesktopWidget offers an array of features to improve your project’s UI/UX:

·        Transform your widgets into a desktop interface with elements like folders, taskbar, launcher, and right-click menus.

·        Organize content using a customizable folder system for easier navigation and management.

·        Implement a functional taskbar to display active widgets and provide quick access to essential functions.

·        Create a customizable launcher for quick access to key features, similar to desktop application launchers.

·        Add context menus to your widgets, giving users additional options and actions through a simple right-click interface.

·        Seamlessly integrate DesktopWidget with your existing projects, ensuring compatibility with various widget types.

·        Tailor the appearance and functionality of the desktop elements to suit your project’s unique needs.

 

Use Cases:

·        Game Development: Enhance in-game menus and HUDs with desktop-like features for a familiar interface.

·        Application Development: Create sophisticated applications within Unreal Engine, complete with desktop-like navigation.

·        Interactive Experiences: Develop interactive and educational experiences with a robust and intuitive UI.

 

Why Choose DesktopWidget?

DesktopWidget provides a comprehensive solution for developers seeking advanced UI features. By incorporating familiar desktop elements, you can create more engaging and user-friendly interfaces that stand out.

 

Getting Started:

Download and install the DesktopWidget plugin from the Unreal Engine Marketplace. Documentation and videos are available to help you quickly integrate and customize the plugin.

 

Support and Community:

Join our community of developers to share ideas. Visit our website for tutorials and contact information.


Important/Additional Notes:

·        For issues or feature requests, contact support
technicalDetails:
Features:

·        Desktop: Create a desktop-like environment with folders, taskbar, launcher, and right-click menus.

·        Folder: Customizable for organizing content.

·        Taskbar: Displays active widgets and provides quick access functions. 

·        Launcher: Customizable for quick access to key features.

·        Right-Click Menu: Provides additional options and actions.

·        Base Clock: Add a functional clock widget to your project that displays the current time, enhancing the desktop-like experience

·        Easy Integration & Customization


Code Modules: DesktopWidget (Runtime) 

Number of Blueprints: 0

Number of C++ Classes: 69

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Win64

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64
